I was conversing with you in the night season. We were having some serious conversation together. You opened before me freely that which you 


                                    -266- 

intended to do. We conversed very pleasantly, and you proposed many things. But after we had canvassed these things thoroughly, you said, "Mother, the only safe path for me is to follow out implicitly the light the Lord has given me in the testimonies you have sent me. . . .
